chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall p0 p1 : prec_list, pl_compat p0 p1 -> pl_compat (upl_conv_0 p0) (upl_conv_0 p1)

Premises:
Inductive prec_list : Set := prec_cons : ad -> prec_list -> prec_list -> prec_list | prec_empty : prec_list
pl_compat = fun pl0 pl1 : prec_list => pl0 = prec_empty /\ pl1 = prec_empty \/ pl0 <> prec_empty /\ pl1 <> prec_empty : prec_list -> prec_list -> Prop
upl_conv_0 = fix upl_conv_0 (p : prec_list) : prec_list := match p with | prec_cons a p0 p1 => prec_cons (uad_conv_0 a) (upl_conv_0 p0) (upl_conv_0 p1) | prec_empty => prec_empty end : prec_list -> prec_list
pl_compatible_compat : forall p0 p1 : prec_list, pl_compatible p0 p1 -> pl_compat p0 p1
pl_tl_length_pl_compat : forall (p0 p1 : prec_list) (n : nat), pl_tl_length p0 n -> pl_tl_length p1 n -> pl_compat p0 p1
upl_conv_0_inj : forall p0 p1 : prec_list, upl_conv_0 p0 = upl_conv_0 p1 -> p0 = p1
Inductive prec_contained : prec_list -> prec_list -> Prop := prec_id : forall p : prec_list, prec_contained p p | prec_c_int0 : forall (p p0 p1 : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_contained p p0 -> prec_contained p (prec_cons a p0 p1) | prec_c_int1 : forall (p p0 p1 : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_contained p p1 -> prec_contained p (prec_cons a p0 p1)
mpl_compat = fun s0 s1 : state => forall (c : ad) (p0 p1 : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s0 c = Some p0 -> MapGet prec_list s1 c = Some p1 -> pl_compat p0 p1 : state -> state -> Prop
umpl_conv_0 = fix umpl_conv_0 (s : state) : state := match s with | @M0 _ => M0 prec_list | @M1 _ a p => M1 prec_list a (upl_conv_0 p) | @M2 _ p0 p1 => M2 prec_list (umpl_conv_0 p0) (umpl_conv_0 p1) end : state -> state
u_merge = fun p0 p1 : preDTA => MapMerge state (udta_conv_0 p0) (udta_conv_1 p1) : preDTA -> preDTA -> preDTA
prec_c_int1 : forall (p p0 p1 : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_contained p p1 -> prec_contained p (prec_cons a p0 p1)
prec_c_int0 : forall (p p0 p1 : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_contained p p0 -> prec_contained p (prec_cons a p0 p1)
prec_contained_1 : forall (a : ad) (p0 p1 p2 : prec_list), prec_contained (prec_cons a p0 p1) p2 -> prec_contained p1 p2
prec_contained_0 : forall (a : ad) (p0 p1 p2 : prec_list), prec_contained (prec_cons a p0 p1) p2 -> prec_contained p0 p2
prec_occur_1 : forall (a : ad) (p0 p1 p2 : prec_list), prec_contained (prec_cons a p0 p1) p2 -> prec_occur p2 a
upl_conv_1 = fix upl_conv_1 (p : prec_list) : prec_list := match p with | prec_cons a p0 p1 => prec_cons (uad_conv_1 a) (upl_conv_1 p0) (upl_conv_1 p1) | prec_empty => prec_empty end : prec_list -> prec_list
pl_compat_sym : forall pl0 pl1 : prec_list, pl_compat pl0 pl1 -> pl_compat pl1 pl0
umpl_conv_1 = fix umpl_conv_1 (s : state) : state := match s with | @M0 _ => M0 prec_list | @M1 _ a p => M1 prec_list a (upl_conv_1 p) | @M2 _ p0 p1 => M2 prec_list (umpl_conv_1 p0) (umpl_conv_1 p1) end : state -> state
upl_conv_0_occur : forall (pl : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_occur (upl_conv_0 pl) (uad_conv_0 a) -> prec_occur pl a
prec_list_ind : forall P : prec_list -> Prop, (forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list), P p -> forall p0 : prec_list, P p0 -> P (prec_cons a p p0)) -> P prec_empty -> forall p : prec_list, P p
prec_list_rect : forall P : prec_list -> Type, (forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list), P p -> forall p0 : prec_list, P p0 -> P (prec_cons a p p0)) -> P prec_empty -> forall p : prec_list, P p
upl_conv_0_occur_in_img : forall (pl : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_occur (upl_conv_0 pl) a -> exists b : ad, a = uad_conv_0 b
u_conv_0_invar_3 : forall (s : state) (c : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet prec_list (umpl_conv_0 s) c = Some (upl_conv_0 p) -> MapGet prec_list s c = Some p
u_conv_0_invar_1 : forall (s : state) (c : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some p -> MapGet prec_list (umpl_conv_0 s) c = Some (upl_conv_0 p)
u_conv_1_invar_6 : forall (s : state) (c : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet prec_list (umpl_conv_1 s) c = Some p -> exists p0 : prec_list, p = upl_conv_1 p0
u_conv_0_invar_6 : forall (s : state) (c : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet prec_list (umpl_conv_0 s) c = Some p -> exists p0 : prec_list, p = upl_conv_0 p0
u_conv_1_invar_7 : forall (s : state) (c : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet prec_list (umpl_conv_1 s) c = Some p -> exists p0 : prec_list, p = upl_conv_1 p0 /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p0
u_conv_0_invar_7 : forall (s : state) (c : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet prec_list (umpl_conv_0 s) c = Some p -> exists p0 : prec_list, p = upl_conv_0 p0 /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p0
mpl_compat_0 : forall (c : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), mpl_compat (M1 prec_list c pl0) (M1 prec_list c pl1) -> pl_compat pl0 pl1
union_pl_1d : forall (d : preDTA) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list) (tl : term_list), pl_compat pl0 pl1 -> liste_reconnait d pl1 tl -> liste_reconnait d (union_pl pl0 pl1) tl
union_pl_0d : forall (d : preDTA) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list) (tl : term_list), pl_compat pl0 pl1 -> liste_reconnait d pl0 tl -> liste_reconnait d (union_pl pl0 pl1) tl
u_merge_inv_1_lst : forall (p1 : preDTA) (pl : prec_list) (lt : term_list), liste_reconnait p1 pl lt -> Prop
u_merge_inv_1_st : forall (p1 : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p1 s t -> Prop
union_pl_r_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), pl_compat pl0 pl1 -> liste_reconnait d (union_pl pl0 pl1) tnil -> liste_reconnait d pl0 tnil \/ liste_reconnait d pl1 tnil
union_pl_r : forall (d : preDTA) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list) (tl : term_list), pl_compat pl0 pl1 -> liste_reconnait d (union_pl pl0 pl1) tl -> liste_reconnait d pl0 tl \/ liste_reconnait d pl1 tl
pl_tl_length_rec_4 : forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> pl_tl_length_rec_def_1 p p0 t
u_conv_lr_1 : forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> Prop
u_conv_str_0_r : forall (p0 : preDTA) (s0 : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p0 s0 t -> Prop
u_conv_rec_1_r : forall (p0 : preDTA) (a0 : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p0 a0 t -> Prop
u_conv_lr_1_r : forall (p0 : preDTA) (pl0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p0 pl0 t -> Prop
u_merge_inv_0_lst : forall (p0 : preDTA) (pl : prec_list) (lt : term_list), liste_reconnait p0 pl lt -> Prop
u_conv_lr_0 : forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> Prop
u_conv_lr_0_r : forall (p0 : preDTA) (pl0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p0 pl0 t -> Prop

``` 
intros p0 p1 H.
unfold pl_compat, upl_conv_0 in *.
destruct H as [Hempty | Hnonempty].
- left. split.
  + reflexivity.
  + reflexivity.
- right. split.
  + intro contra. destruct Hnonempty. discriminate.
  + intro contra. destruct Hnonempty. discriminate.
Qed.
```
